articles.title: Fish "Math" Studies Offer Insights on Ways to Treat Human Neuro Disorders - Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News
articles.description: Some fish are ideal models for studying the molecular and genetic bases of the sense of quantity.
articles.content:
Fish are helping researchers track down the origins of how brains compute math, according to a review (Quantity as a Fish Views It: Behavior and Neurobiology) in Frontiers in Neuroanatomy.
